body:
## Before you start

To try and help you, here are a few things you may need to have to hand;

- The case reference and end date of your original trial

- The date you applied for permission to appeal

- The case reference and date of any retrial

- Any documents that you want to include to support your claim

components.html: This form should take no longer than 10 minutes to complete.

heading: Claim compensation for a miscarriage of justice
lede: Use this online form to apply for compensation for a miscarriage of justice.
